attributes.action:
Make weeks only 4 days at school
And work but still be paid the same amount.
attributes.background: People work too many hours and don’t have enough free time with their family and for leisure activity. Also when we have a bank holiday it is just so much better.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

UK and EU law places limits on the total amount of time someone can work during a week and the minimum amount they can be paid an hour, but it doesn't specify how many or which days of the week they have to work.

You could start a new petition calling for a law placing limits on the number of days someone is allowed to work during a week if that is something you would like to see happen.
